title: Banana-Nutella Tortilla Pizza
directions: Spread chocolate-hazelnut spread onto 1 side of the tortilla and top with banana slices.
Place tortilla in a large skillet and cook over high heat until tortilla is crispy and sturdy, about 5 minutes. Transfer "pizza" to a plate and cool, 3 to 4 minutes. Cut into 4 slices.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella), or to taste
